articles.description: A total solar eclipse is coming to North America on April 8.

articles.author: Lily Kepner
articles.title: 'We did not see this coming': UT staff, students react to layoffs, DCCE closure after SB17 - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: UT community is shocked and saddened after the layoffs of an estimated 60 staff members and the closing of the DDCE post Texas' anti-DEI bill, SB 17.
articles.content: Students and community members are reeling after the University of Texas announced it was closing the Division of Campus and Community Engagement previously known as the Division of Diversity and Com… [+8842 chars]
